NEW DELHI: After rallying over 100 points, the Sensex slipped in the red. The early gains were led by ICICI Bank, , , and SBI. At 12:19 p.m.; the 50-share index was trading at 6650.90, down 1.65 points, or 0.02%. The S&P BSE Sensex ​was at 22316.27; down 7.63 points, or 0.03%.
